Welcome to the HHD Software Free Hex Editor Neo. Your copy of Hex Editor Neo is now configured to run in the FREE mode. You'll be able to use the wide set of features included in the Free Edition.\r\n\r\nYou may also start evaluating features that are part of Standard, Professional and Ultimate Edition at any time.

Operating system is applying compatibility settings for Hex Editor Neo. Application may fail to operate properly when these settings are in effect. In addition, running under compatibility settings may affect performance and visual quality.\r\n\nSelect what would you like to do now:
Remove compatibility settings and restart application

Message.value: If you would like to be notified of the status of your crash report submission and want your reports to be processed with higher priority, please provide your e-mail address in the box below. Your e-mail address will not be used for anything else beyond discussion of your submission.

Minidumps usually have a size less than a megabyte and contain only limited information about a crash. Sometimes a minidump is enough to diagnose the problem, but often it lacks necessary information required to reproduce the crash.

Full dumps contain the compressed view of all process address space. They are best to allow developers to reproduce the situation that caused the crash and fix it as soon as possible. However, the size of a full dump may easily reach hundreds of megabytes.
